recommendations: Ritvik Patil “I had the pleasure of working with Sai Sneha on multiple occasions. During those times, I was consistently impressed by her ability to take on complex projects and deliver results. Sai Sneha has a unique blend of strategic thinking and tactical execution, making her a valuable asset to any team. She has a strong ability to understand the needs of the customer, and can translate those needs into product requirements and plans. Additionally, she has excellent communication skills and is able to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive projects forward. I highly recommend Sai Sneha for any product management role. She has the skills and experience to make a real impact on any team and organization.”

Nishant Khalde “Sneha is one of the very organised person that I have come across. I have worked with her for a user research project and her skill to mine user insights and understand the users is exceptional.”
